name: Stoychev & Stoycheva Law Firm
goal:
Stoychev & Stoycheva Law Firm is a law firm that comprises experts in various legal fields with legal experience in Bulgaria, France, Germany and Belgium. Stoychev & Stoycheva Law Firm has a well established network of partnered law firms located in more than 30 countries throughout the Americas, Europe, Africa and Asia, positioning it to help its clients with their legal needs around the world.

We strive to be the leading global business law firm by delivering quality and value to our clients. We achieve this through practical and innovative legal solutions that help our clients succeed.

Our clients range from multinational enterprises to emerging companies developing industry-leading technologies. Our work is always client-focused. We will not accept a legal engagement unless we know that we have the right legal professionals for the case.

We know that our clients would not be asking for our help if they were not requiring it. We are honored that our clients trust us to support them.
interests: Agriculture, Banking and financial services, Borders and Security, Budget, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Culture and media, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Environment, European Neighbourhood Policy, External Relations, Food Safety, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Fraud prevention, General and Institutional Affairs, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Migration and asylum, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Sport, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives: The EU policies relevant to Stoychev & Stoycheva Law Firm includes pharmaceuticals, tax, corporate & commercial, mergers & acquisitions, private equity & venture capital, restructuring & insolvency, employment, shareholder disputes, banking and finance, project finance, capital markets, litigation & arbitration, competition, intellectual property, digital single market, energy, public procurement, healthcare & life science, trade, environment, real estate, infrastructure & public private partnership, transport and logistics.
